trans-unit.source: Creates an activity to do synchronous or asynchronous batch work that can use COM+ services without needing to create a COM+ component.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en aktivitet for å utføre synkron eller asynkron bunke arbeid som kan bruke COM +-tjenester uten for å opprette en COM +-komponent.

trans-unit.source: The context associated with the activity is completely determined by a <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig> object.
trans-unit.target: Konteksten tilknyttet aktiviteten fullstendig avhenger av en <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>objektet.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Activity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Activity"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity> that is used to submit batch work to COM+ services.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity>som brukes til å sende satsvise arbeid COM +-tjenester.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity>

trans-unit.source: The context associated with the activity is completely determined by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig> object that is passed through the `cfg` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Konteksten tilknyttet aktiviteten fullstendig fastsettes av den <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>objektet som overføres via den `cfg` parameteren.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"></xref> that contains the configuration information for the services to be used.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"> </xref> som inneholder konfigurasjonsinformasjon for tjenestene som skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Activity"></xref> is not supported on the current platform.
Runs the specified user-defined batch work asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Kjører angitte brukerdefinerte bunken arbeidet asynkront.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.IServiceCall"></xref> object that is used to implement the batch work.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.IServiceCall"> </xref> objekt som brukes til å implementere satsvis jobb.

trans-unit.source: Binds the user-defined work to the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Binding brukerdefinerte arbeidet til gjeldende tråd.

trans-unit.source: BindToCurrentThread binds the batch work that is submitted by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.SynchronousCall%2A> or <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall%2A> methods to the current single-threaded apartment (STA).
trans-unit.target: BindToCurrentThread binding satsvis jobb som er rapportert av den <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.SynchronousCall%2A>eller <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall%2A>metoder for å gjeldende single-threaded apartment (STA).</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.SynchronousCall%2A>

trans-unit.source: BindToCurrentThread has no effect if the current thread is being run in the multithreaded apartment (MTA).
trans-unit.target: BindToCurrentThread har ingen virkning hvis gjeldende tråd kjøres i flere tråder apartment (MTA).

trans-unit.source: The current thread model is determined by the configuration of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.ThreadPool%2A> property of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig> object.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende modellen tråd avgjøres av konfigurasjonen av de <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.ThreadPool%2A>for den <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>objektet.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.ThreadPool%2A>

trans-unit.source: Runs the specified user-defined batch work synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Kjører angitte brukerdefinerte bunken arbeidet synkront.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.IServiceCall"></xref> object that is used to implement the batch work.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.IServiceCall"> </xref> objekt som brukes til å implementere satsvis jobb.

trans-unit.source: Unbinds the batch work that is submitted by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.SynchronousCall*> or <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall*> methods from the thread on which the batch work is running.
trans-unit.target: Frigir satsvis jobb som er rapportert av den <> </> *> eller <> </> *> metoder fra tråden satsvis jobb kjører.

trans-unit.source: UnbindFromThread has no effect if the batch work was not previously bound to a thread.
trans-unit.target: UnbindFromThread har ingen virkning hvis satsvis jobb ikke ble tidligere bundet til en tråd.
